channel.title: Home on sysherry's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on sysherry's blog

item.title: Hugo Theme Walden
item.author: sysherry.lee@gmail.com (sysherry)
item.description: After reading Walden, a collection of essays by American writer Henry David Thoreau, I was deeply influenced by his love of nature and simple living. So, I wrote this concise and clear theme for my personal website and named it Walden.

item.title: Shortcodes Syntax - Carousel
item.author: sysherry.lee@gmail.com (sysherry)
item.description: Carousel is a useful shortcode in theme Walden, Used to display multiple images with their information.

item.title: Shortcodes Syntax
item.author: sysherry.lee@gmail.com (sysherry)
item.description: Shortcodes are simple snippets inside your content files calling built-in or custom templates. They are created to circumvent the limitations of Markdown Syntax.

item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.author: sysherry.lee@gmail.com (sysherry)
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language used to add formatting elements to plaintext text documents. This article shows the syntax of markdown elements in hugo theme Walden.

item.title: 安娜普尔纳 ABC 九日
item.author: sysherry.lee@gmail.com (sysherry)
item.description: 安娜普尔纳（Annapurana）地区位于尼泊尔北部的喜马拉雅山中段，有两条成熟且知名的徒步线路：一条去往安娜普尔纳大本营ABC（Annapurna Base Camp），另一条围绕着安娜普尔纳群峰行进的环线ACT（Annapurna Circle Trail）。

item.title: 我的大学校园
item.author: sysherry.lee@gmail.com (sysherry)
item.description: 上海交通大学是我的母校，成立于1896年，是一座百年名校。母校的校园很美，特别是我就读的徐汇校区，有许多优秀的历史建筑，不仅记录着学校的发展，还沉淀着深厚的人文精神。
